first_para: Alderman Maurice Devenney is a British politician from the Democratic Unionist Party representing Foyle in the Northern Ireland Assembly. He took office on the 20th October 2014 after succeeding retiring party member William Hay.

full.extract:
Alderman Maurice Devenney is a British politician from the Democratic Unionist Party representing Foyle in the Northern Ireland Assembly. He took office on the 20th October 2014 after succeeding retiring party member William Hay.
Since 2005 he has been a member of Derry City Council and between 2011 and 2012 he served as Mayor of the city. 
^ [1]
^ [2]
^ [3]
full.title: Maurice Devenney
